jtbdStatement: Help curators review and approve ground-truth data items through an assignment-based workflow

topics.name: assignment-workflow
topics.description: The assignment workflow manages how curators receive, claim, and complete work items.

topics.name: explorer-view
topics.description: The explorer view allows curators to browse and filter ground-truth items outside the assigned queue.

topics.name: curation-editor
topics.description: The curation editor enables viewing and editing ground-truth content, including tags.

topics.name: reference-management
topics.description: The reference management system supports adding, visiting, and annotating supporting sources.

topics.name: export-snapshots
topics.description: The export system generates downloadable JSON snapshots of curated data.

topics.name: data-persistence
topics.description: The persistence layer abstracts storage behind repositories with Cosmos DB as the primary backend.

topics.name: observability-operations
topics.description: The observability and operations system provides opt-in telemetry, error handling, and health status.
